creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: two women struggle to pull two male travelers into their teahouse, while a third looks on; at R, a man sits on a raised area in a tea house preparing to wash his feet in the water basin brought by an older woman; young woman leans out the window watching the scene outside; at a distance, a few travelers walk down street lined with shuttered buildings with thatched roofs
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LLQ; upper center
title: Goyu, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
